title: Rolled Youkisoba!
detail_text: <:th_ch0004/>I smell something good!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Just wait a bit! I’m making You-chan’s special Youkisoba!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>The savory aroma is making me salivate...... I can’t wait!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Alright, here you go~ Thanks for waiting!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>......? This is a meat roll......?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>I wrapped Youkisoba in pork. This one is glazed with meat sauce, and this one is wrapped with egg and covered with ketchup~ Come on, try it!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Don’t mind if I do! Nom......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>What do you think? I plan to serve this next time there’s a festival in Numazu~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>You...... This is incredible! Bite-size yakisoba...... No, Youkisoba is perfect for festivals!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Yay! I’ll go see what everyone else thinks.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
